citation.title: High fidelity simulations of electroactive membrane wings

video.title: PI control of an electroactive membrane wing with OpenFOAM
video.summary:
Proportional Integral control of an electroactive membrane wing.
FSI 2D simulation performed with OpenFOAM (foam-extend)

Center: reference case at AoA 12deg
Top: Open loop control with forcing frequency same as the natural frequency of the reference case

video.title: subsetMesh motion of a membrane wing simulated with OpenFOAM
video.summary:
FSI 2D simulation performed with OpenFOAM (foam-extend)

References:
http://arc.aiaa.org/doi/abs/10.2514/6.2015-1301
http://arc.aiaa.org/doi/abs/10.2514/6.2016-1351

video.title: FSI simulation of an electroactive membrane wing with OpenFOAM
video.summary:
FSI 2D simulation performed with OpenFOAM (foam-extend)

Inlet condition going from 0 to 20 deg.

video.title: Vorticity field of a membrane wing simulated with OpenFOAM
video.summary:
Fluid Structure Interaction 2D simulation performed with OpenFOAM (foam-extend)
AoA 8 deg
